text.greeting.recurring.morning: Good morning, {{name}}. How can I help you?
text.greeting.recurring.afternoon: Good afternoon, {{name}}. How can I help you?
text.greeting.recurring.evening: Good evening, {{name}}. How can I help you?
text.greeting.recurring.night: Good night, {{name}}. How can I help you?
text.input.tip: Use @ to list and mention elements on the page.
text.error.rest.timeout: Request timed out. Please try again later.
text.error.request.failed: Error sending request. Check your connection and try again.
text.error.configuration: Juke Operator is not configured correctly. Please contact your System Administrator.
text.error.google.unauthorized: You are not authorized to use this model.
text.error.google.forbidden: You are not allowed to use this model.
text.error.google.requestTimeout: AI service request timed out. Please try again.
text.error.google.tooManyRequests: Too many requests. Please try again later.
text.error.google.serverError: AI service encountered an error. Please try again later.
text.error.google.serviceUnavailable: AI service is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
text.error.response.maxTokens: Token limit exceeded. Your prompt lead to pruned response that cannot be parsed.
text.error.response.finishReason: AI service stopped generating response. Reason <{{finishReason}}>.
text.error.response.safety: Generation stopped because of safety violation.
text.error.response.prohibitedContent: Generation stopped because prohibited content was detected.
text.error.response.spii: Generation stopped because sensitive personally identifiable information was detected.
text.system.stopped.user: Stopped as requested. Let me know how to proceed.
text.system.stopped.system: Your request was taking too long, so I stopped. Let me know if you'd like me to continue.
text.error.message.repeat.notFound: Sorry, I couldn't repeat your message.
text.error.message.update.notFound: Sorry, something went wrong, while displaying result.
text.error.response.parse: Sorry, I couldn't parse the result correctly.
text.error.response.unexpected: Sorry, I couldn't generate the result correctly.
text.error.analysis.incorrect: Sorry, I couldn't analyze your request correctly.
text.error.generation.incorrect: Sorry, I couldn't generate result for your request correctly.
text.error.license.missing: No valid license found. Please contact your administrator
text.error.license.expired: License expired. Please contact your administrator.
